cu.error_type: unreachable elements or wrong routing definitions
cu.explanation_en: Changing the AMF IP address to an unreachable subnet (10.0.0.1) will prevent the CU from connecting to the AMF, causing registration failures.

du.error_type: unreachable elements or wrong routing definitions
du.explanation_en: Changing the remote N address to an unreachable subnet (192.168.1.1) will prevent the DU from connecting to the CU, causing F1 interface failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將遠端 N 地址更改為無法訪問的子網 (192.168.1.1) 將阻止 DU 連接到 CU，導致 F1 接口故障。
